summary: A Czech journalist joins a Prague radio station that broadcasts Nazi propaganda in order to protect his Jewish wife. However, as the Nazi rule over Czechoslovakia calls for more and more ... See full summary »
cast: Matthias Brandt|Jan Budar|David Czesany|Marek Daniel|Cyril Drozda|Ludmila Hroudová|Pavel Kryl|Tomás Mechácek|Klára Melísková|Martin Mysicka|Václav Neuzil|Leos Noha|Sandra Nováková|Jirí Ornest|Jana Plodková|Josef Polásek|Jan Rehák|Simon Schwarz|Daniel Sidon|Jindrich Skopec|Vit Sky|Ida Sovová|Lubomírský Tadeás|Marta Vítu|Tomás Zatecka
title: Protektor
